$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/list-standa.text:
<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-icons" value="yes"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-text" value="yes"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" value=""> {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/tag-manager}} <$list filter={{$:/core/Filters/AllTags!!filter}}> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate"/> <$count filter="[all[current]tagging[]]"/>
{{$:/core/ui/UntaggedTemplate}}
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/list-standa.caption: Standard tags
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/list-standa.creator: TonGerner
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/list-standa.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/list-standard-tags

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/readme.text:
This plugin creates a toolbar on top of the screen.
With buttons to replicate the functions normally only available in the sidebar and buttons for a few new functions: tagging in view mode, rename tags, delete a corrupt tiddler, list (open/all/recent/tags/untagged), new template tiddler, ... <<< ''Note:''
''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tongerner/layout_adjustment plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/).'' <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tongerner/layout_adjustment/tweaks]]. The buttons in the toolbar can be switched on/off in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > Toolbars > [[Top toolbar|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/TopToolbar]]''. Drag and drop to change the ordering. <<< ''Note:'' * This plugin incorporates a slightly modified version of [[Danielo's TagsSearch plugin|http://braintest.tiddlyspot.com/#TagsSearch-Plugin]] * If used, ''the standard search button ({{$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/images/search}}) needs to be the first button!'' * For toggling of sticky behaviour, see ~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tongerner/layout_adjustment/tweaks]] (tab Layout) * All 'List' buttons do not work via 'More actions'! * In case you want the possibility to enable/disable the toolbar, drag & drop $:/_toggle-toolbar-plugin-button (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/ & http://tw5toolbar.tiddlyspot.com/) to your TW5
It creates a button ({{$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/images/enable-toolbar}} / {{$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/images/disable-toolbar}}) in the right topbar which enables/disables the toolbar plugin. ''You need to click this button twice to perform the action!'' <<<
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/readme.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/readme
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/readme.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/settings.text:
!!Toolbar settings @@.brown ''Toolbar''@@ <> <> <> <> <> <> @@.brown ''Menus''@@ <> <>
<$button tooltip="Help"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-window" $param="$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/settings-help" height="450px" width="700px"/>Help
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/settings.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/settings
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/settings.creator: TonGerner
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/settings.caption: Toolbar

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/settings-he.text:
|Item|Entry |Description |Default |h |''Toolbar(s)'' |Size 'Toolbar' buttons|Size of toolbar buttons| 1.4em | |~|Color 'Toolbar' buttons|Color of toolbar buttons|#AAAAAA| |~|Hover color 'Toolbar' buttons|Hover color of toolbar buttons|#131313| |~|Start 'Top toolbar' |Start of the top toolbar
(from the left)| 40px | |~|Top 'Toolbar'|Offset from top
(Top left + Top right bar)| 10px | |~|Button spacing 'Top toolbar' |Distance between buttons of Topbar toolbar
(Top left + Top right bar)| 5px | |''Menus'' |Scroll height 'list' menus |Scroll height of 'list' menus in toolbar | 400px | |~|Font size 'list' menus |Font size for 'list' menu entries | 1em |
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/settings-he.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/settings-help
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/settings-he.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/styles.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/styles
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/styles.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/rename-tags.text:
Thanks to [[Alberto Molina|https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/tiddlywiki/OCntQ79DuwM]]. ''Search tag:''
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/renametags/search" tag="input" default="" placeholder="Enter tag to be replaced" size=20/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/renametags/search" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/renametags/search" text="" /> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
''Replace by:''
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/renametags/replace" tag="input" default="" placeholder="Enter tag to replace" size=20/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/renametags/replace" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/renametags/replace" text="" /> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
''First step''
Apply the tag ''//{{$:/temp/renametags/replace}}//'' to the following tiddlers: <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]!has[draft.of]tag{$:/temp/renametags/search}!tag{$:/temp/renametags/replace}sort[created]]"> <$checkbox tag={{$:/temp/renametags/replace}}> <$link to={{!!title}}> <$view field="title"/> ''Second step''
Remove the tag ''//{{$:/temp/renametags/search}}//'' from the following tiddlers: <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]!has[draft.of]tag{$:/temp/renametags/search}tag{$:/temp/renametags/replace}sort[created]]"> <$checkbox tag={{$:/temp/renametags/search}}> ~~<$link to={{!!title}}> <$view field="title"/> ~~
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/rename-tags.creator: TonGerner
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/rename-tags.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/rename-tags

$:/tags/TopLeftBar.text:
The buttons in the toolbar can be switched on/off in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > Toolbars > Top toolbar''. Drag and drop the buttons to change the ordering. Additional buttons can become available when my 'tiddlersbar' or 'tabstory' plugin is used: """ $:/plugins/tongerner/tiddlersbar/button $:/plugins/tongerner/tabstory/button """ <<< ''Note:''
To let $:/plugins/tongerner/tiddlersbar/button and/or $:/plugins/tongerner/tabstory/button show up in in ''ControlPanel > Appearance > Toolbars > Top toolbar'', you need to add a tag $:/tags/TopLeftBar to these buttons! <<<
$:/tags/TopLeftBar.title: $:/tags/TopLeftBar
$:/tags/TopLeftBar.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/tagging.text:
\whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/ \define tag-styles() background-color:$(backgroundColor)$; fill:$(foregroundColor)$; color:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \define tag-body-inner(colour,fallbackTarget,colourA,colourB,icon) \whitespace trim <$vars foregroundColor=<> backgroundColor="""$colour$"""> > class="tc-tag-label tc-tag-list-item"> <$transclude tiddler="""$icon$"""/> <$view field="title" format="text" /> <$button message="tm-remove-tag" param={{!!title}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-remove-tag-button">× \end \define tag-body(colour,palette,icon) <$macrocall $name="tag-body-inner" colour="""$colour$""" fallbackTarget={{$palette$##tag-background}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}} icon="""$icon$"""/> \end \define tag-picker-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="tags" $subfilter="[] [all[current]tags[]]" /> \end
<$fieldmangler> <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]" storyview="pop"> <$macrocall $name="tag-body" colour={{!!color}} palette={{$:/palette}} icon={{!!icon}}/> <$macrocall $name="tag-picker" actions=<>/>
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/tagging.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/tagging
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/tagging.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/corrupt-tid.text: <$edit-text class="tc-edit-texteditor" default="After entering the title of the tiddler (above), the source of the 'corrupt' tiddler will be displayed here and can be edited." tiddler={{$:/temp/corrupt-tiddler}}/>
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/corrupt-tid.creator: TonGerner
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/corrupt-tid.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/corrupt-tiddler-input

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search-dele.text:
Thanks to [[Stephan Hradek/Matabele|https://groups.google.com/d/msg/tiddlywiki/U9GYlwVXp6M/lubA413asP4J]]/[[Tobias Beer|https://tobibeer.github.io/tb5/#Deleting%20Tiddlers%20Via%20Lists]] Enter filter expression
(e.g. `[prefix[$:/state/]]`, `[tag[mytag]]` or more specific `[tag[mytag]search[mytext]]`): <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/delete-filter">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/delete-filter" tag="input" placeholder="enter a filter expression" default="" size=50/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/delete-filter" type="nomatch" text=""> <$link to="" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
Click @@.tgc-underlined link@@ to expand tiddler, click ''↗'' to open tiddler, click {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} to delete tiddler.
Click @@.dummybutton Delete all: ''[filter]'' tiddlers@@ to delete ''all'' filtered tiddlers. <$list filter={{$:/temp/delete-filter}} template="$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/expandable-tiddler"/> <$button> <$set name="myVariable" value={{$:/temp/delete-filter}}> <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<> /> Delete all: ''{{$:/temp/delete-filter}}'' tiddlers
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search-dele.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search-delete-tiddlers
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search-dele.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/danielo/tagSearch/macros/extr.creator: Danielo Rodriguez
$:/plugins/danielo/tagSearch/macros/extr.title: $:/plugins/danielo/tagSearch/macros/extractTagsAsFilter.js

$:/plugins/danielo/tagSearch/readme.text:
This plugin allows you to refine searches using tags. It's possible to search without any tag and the opposite, using just tags as filter.

!! How to use
After installing it you will have a new tab in "Advanced search" tiddler. You can also transclude this search whatever you want just transcluding it

```
{{TagsSearch}}
```
$:/plugins/danielo/tagSearch/readme.title: $:/plugins/danielo/tagSearch/readme

$:/plugins/danielo/tagSearch/SearchFilte.title: $:/plugins/danielo/tagSearch/SearchFilter

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/tagssearch.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/ \define tag-styles() background-color:$(backgroundColor)$; fill:$(foregroundColor)$; color:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \define tag-body-inner(colour,fallbackTarget,colourA,colourB) <$vars foregroundColor=<> backgroundColor="""$colour$"""> > class="tc-tag-label"> <$view field="title" format="text" /> <$button message="tm-remove-tag" param={{!!title}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-remove-tag-button">× \end \define tag-body(colour,palette) <$macrocall $name="tag-body-inner" colour="""$colour$""" fallbackTarget={{$palette$##tag-background}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}}/> \end \define tag-filter() [![$:/temp/search]!has[draft.of]!is[current]$(systemFilter)$$(shadowFilter)$$(searchFilter)$$(tagNames)$sort[title]] \define show-system()
System tiddlers: <$radio field="systemfilter" value=""> Show   <$radio field="systemfilter" value="!is[system]"> Hide
\end \define show-shadow()
Shadow: <$radio field="shadowfilter" value="is[shadow]"> Show <$radio field="shadowfilter" value="!is[shadow]"> Hide
\end Thanks to [[Danielo|http://braintest.tiddlyspot.com/#TagsSearch-Plugin]]
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/search" type="search" tag="input"/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/search" type="nomatch" text=""> <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/search"> <$link to="" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$fieldmangler tiddler="$:/temp/search">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/NewTagName" tag="input" default="" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Add/Placeholder}} focusPopup=<> class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-popup-handle"/> <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Dropdown/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Dropdown/Caption}}>{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$button message="tm-add-tag" param={{$:/temp/NewTagName}} set="$:/temp/NewTagName" setTo="" tooltip="Add tag">''+''
<$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="">
<$linkcatcher set="$:/temp/NewTagName" setTo="" message="tm-add-tag"> <$list filter="[tags[]!is[system]search:title{$:/temp/NewTagName}sort[]]"> {{||$:/core/ui/Components/tag-link}}
<$list filter="[tags[]is[system]search:title{$:/temp/NewTagName}sort[]]"> {{||$:/core/ui/Components/tag-link}}
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/search]tags[]sort[title]]" storyview="pop"><$set name="backgroundColor" value={{!!color}}>> class="tc-tag-label"> <$view field="title" format="text" /> <$button message="tm-remove-tag" param={{!!title}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-remove-tag-button">×
<>
<$set name="searchFilter" value=<> > <$set name="tagNames" value=<> > <$set name="systemFilter" value={{!!systemfilter}}> Click @@.tgc-underlined link@@ to expand tiddler, click ''↗'' to open tiddler, click {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} to delete tiddler. <$list filter=<> template="$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/expandable-tiddler">
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/tagssearch.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/tagssearch
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/tagssearch.creator: TonGerner
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/tagssearch.caption: Tags search

$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/TopTool.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/TiddlerInfo/

\define config-base() $:/config/TopLeftBarButtons/Visibility/

{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Toolbars/TopLeftBar/Hint}}

<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-icons" value="yes">

<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-text" value="yes">

<$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag="$:/tags/TopLeftBar" itemTemplate="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/ItemTemplate"/>

</$set>

</$set>
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/TopTool.caption: Top toolbar
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/TopTool.creator: TonGerner
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/TopTool.title: $:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/TopToolbar

$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/topleftbar.text: \define config-title() $:/config/TopLeftBarButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end <$view field="title"/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TopLeftBar]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="inline"/>
$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/topleftbar.title: $:/core/ui/PageTemplate/topleftbar
$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/topleftbar.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search.text:
<$set name="searchTiddler" value="$:/temp/search">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/search" type="search" tag="input" focus={{$:/config/Search/AutoFocus}} focusPopup=<> class="tc-popup-handle"/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/search" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text={{$:/temp/search}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/search" text=""/> <$action-navigate $to="$:/AdvancedSearch"/> {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/search" text="" /> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[{$:/temp/search}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" variable="listItem"> <$set name="searchTerm" value={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[!is[system]search]"/>"""> {{$:/language/Search/Matches}} <$reveal state="$:/temp/search" type="match" text=""> <$button to="$:/AdvancedSearch" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}
<$reveal tag="div" class="tc-block-dropdown-wrapper" state="$:/temp/search" type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal tag="div" class="tc-block-dropdown tc-search-drop-down tc-popup-handle" state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default=""> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/search}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" emptyMessage="""
{{$:/language/Search/Search/TooShort}}
""" variable="listItem"> {{$:/core/ui/SearchResults}}
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/c.text:
Thanks to [[Alberto Molina|https://groups.google.com/d/msg/tiddlywiki/JRtIBfv2WO4/lmtywZIMQy8J]] ''Enter title of 'corrupt' tiddler:'' <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/corrupt-tiddler">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/corrupt-tiddler" type="search" tag="input" default="" placeholder="Enter title of 'corrupt' tiddler" size=50/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/corrupt-tiddler" type="nomatch" text=""> <$link to="" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
''Edit text of corrupt tiddler:'' {{$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/corrupt-tiddler-input}}
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/c.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/corrupt-tiddler
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/c.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/e.text:
<$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" selectedClass="tgc-font-bold"> <$view field="title"/> <$link>↗ <$button message="tm-delete-tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible" param={{!!title}}>{{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]!prefix[$]sort[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate"/>
^^''<$view field="created" format="date" template="YYYY-0MM-0DD 0hh:0mm:0ss" />'' / <$view field="modified" format="date" template="YYYY-0MM-0DD 0hh:0mm:0ss" />^^
<$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$transclude mode="block"/>
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/e.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/expandable-tiddler
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/e.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/n.text:
This is a - demo - template [[$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/new-tiddler]] tagged with `task` and `field` color = #04B.

Make your own template  - with content, tag(s), and field(s) to your liking:

* by modifying [[$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/new-tiddler]]

:''or''

* by making your own template (e.g. [[MyTemplate]]) and modifying [[$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/buttons/new-template-tiddler]]: replace 'param="$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/new-tiddler"' by 'param="MyTemplate"'.
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/n.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/templates/new-tiddler

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/images/cale.text:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-label="Calendar" role="img" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 512 512">
<path d="M512 455c0 32-25 57-57 57H57c-32 0-57-25-57-57V128c0-31 25-57 57-57h398c32 0 57 26 57 57z" fill="#e0e7ec"/>
<path d="M484 0h-47c2 4 4 9 4 14a28 28 0 1 1-53-14H124c3 4 4 9 4 14A28 28 0 1 1 75 0H28C13 0 0 13 0 28v157h512V28c0-15-13-28-28-28z" fill="#dd2f45"/>
<g fill="#f3aab9">
  <circle cx="470" cy="142" r="14"/>
  <circle cx="470" cy="100" r="14"/>
  <circle cx="427" cy="142" r="14"/>
  <circle cx="427" cy="100" r="14"/>
  <circle cx="384" cy="142" r="14"/>
  <circle cx="384" cy="100" r="14"/>
</g>
<text id="month" x="32" y="164" fill="#fff" font-family="monospace" font-size="140px" style="text-anchor: left; text-transform: uppercase;"><<now mmm>></text>
<text id="day" x="256" y="400" fill="#66757f" font-family="monospace" font-size="256px" style="text-anchor: middle"><<now DD>></text>
<text id="weekday" x="256" y="480" fill="#66757f" font-family="monospace" font-size="64px" style="text-anchor: middle"><<now DDD>></text>
</svg>
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/images/cale.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/images/calendar

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/buttons/tog.text: <$fieldmangler tiddler="$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/toggle-fields-handling"> <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/toggle-fields-handling]tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]]"> <$button message="tm-remove-tag" tooltip="Hide field handling in view mode" param="$:/tags/ViewTemplate" class=<>> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/images/fields}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="hide field handling in view mode"/> <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/toggle-fields-handling]!tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]]"> <$button message="tm-add-tag" tooltip="Field handling in view mode" param="$:/tags/ViewTemplate" class=<>> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/images/fields}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="field handling in view mode"/>
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/buttons/tog.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/buttons/toggle-field-handling
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/buttons/tog.description: Toggle field handling in view mode

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/buttons/tog.caption: {{$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/images/fields}} field handling

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/toggle-fiel.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/ \define config-title() $:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/$(currentField)$ \end \define config-filter() [[hide]] -[title{$(config-title)$}] \end \define new-field() <$vars name={{$:/temp/newfieldname}}> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" default=<>> <$button> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-field" $name=<> $value={{$:/temp/newfieldvalue}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/newfieldname"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/newfieldvalue"/> <> <$reveal type="match" text="" default=<>> <$button> <> \end
<$list filter="[all[current]fields[]] +[sort[title]]" variable="currentField"> <$list filter=<> variable="temp">
<$text text=<>/>: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field=<> placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Value/Placeholder}}/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Remove/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Remove/Caption}}> <$action-deletefield $field=<>/> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
<$fieldmangler>
<> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/newfieldname" tag="input" default="" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Name/Placeholder}} focusPopup=<> class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-popup-handle"/> <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Dropdown/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Dropdown/Caption}}>{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="">
<$set name="tv-show-missing-links" value="yes"> <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/newfieldname">
<>
<$list filter="[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]search:title{$:/temp/newfieldname}sort[]] -created -creator -draft.of -draft.title -modified -modifier -tags -text -title -type" variable="currentField"> <$link to=<>> <>
<>
<$list filter="[fields[]search:title{$:/temp/newfieldname}sort[]] -[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]]" variable="currentField"> <$link to=<>> <>
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/newfieldvalue" tag="input" default="" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Value/Placeholder}} class="tc-edit-texteditor"/> <$macrocall $name="new-field"/>
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/toggle-fiel.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/toggle-fields-handling

$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search-in-f.text:
\define searchInField(field, for, ci) <$list filter="[!is[shadow]!is[system]regexp:$field$[$for$$ci$]limit[1]]">
$field$
<$list filter="[!is[shadow]!is[system]regexp:$field$[$for$$ci$]]">
<$link><$view field="title"/>
\end Thanks to [[Tobias Beer|https://tobibeer.github.io/tb5/#Searching%20In%20Tiddler%20Fields]] Search in fields...   <$checkbox field="case-insensitive" tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" checked="(?i)"> case insensitive
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="search" tag="input"/> <$select field="field" tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" default=""> <$list filter="[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]sort[]]" variable="field"> <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch!!field" type="match" text="">
<$list filter="[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]]" variable="field"> <$reveal type=nomatch text=text default=<>> <$macrocall $name="searchInField" field=<> for={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} ci={{$:/temp/advancedsearch!!case-insensitive}}/>
<$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch!!field" type="nomatch" text="">
<$macrocall $name="searchInField" field={{$:/temp/advancedsearch!!field}} for={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} ci={{$:/temp/advancedsearch!!case-insensitive}}/>
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search-in-f.title: $:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search-in-fields
$:/plugins/tongerner/toolbar/search-in-f.caption: In Fields
